courses.name: General English (Beginner to Upper Intermediate)
courses.tuitionDetail: $250 per week if enrolled for less than 12 weeks
courses.durationDetail: Minimum 12 weeks (10 wks Tuition + 2 wks Break)
courses.note: Australia Institute of Business and Technology qualifications only fulfil the academic requirement, not a licensed trade qualification, traineeship or apprenticeship.
